short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helpful utilities to manage your Higher Level FX VPS.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides minor improvements to the Higher Level FX VPS to simplify usage of the VPS.  This includes such features as a paste button that allows easily pasting content from the clipboard into the VPS.
